quote: The car is not a rabbit or a deer that jumps around in sweeping lines, but it is a man-made work of technology in need of an appropriate roadway.
author: Fritz Todt

quote: I never thought, in my lifetime, that you'd be able to watch movies, read books and listen to music from a phone, but I guess the technology of tomorrow is here today.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: I'm trying my best to keep up with all this new technology, and I surround myself with all these wonderful people that are in the know and kind of help me out with all that.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: I love technology - yes, I have fallen in love with older cars, but I'm all for new technology.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Why should Congresspeople have to visit D.C.? Thanks to Skype, meetings are possible across the country. Thanks to email, communications are simple. And we've had the technology to vote from afar for decades. Why should we have backroom deals made over cigars thousands of miles distant from those who are affected by those deals?
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: When it comes to nuclear technology, the Iranian people are very sensitive. It is a part of our national pride, and nuclear technology has become indigenous.
author: Hassan Rouhani

quote: Here's the thing about Apple technology: once you own a piece, you want to use it.
author: Warren Ellis

quote: I like connecting with people through technology.
author: Theophilus London

quote: Grassroots techies - the mostly unknown people who write code and start companies that don't make the headlines - hate, loathe, and despise Microsoft. At technology conferences, it is the devil, or the guaranteed laugh line. Its products are mocked, its business practices booed.
author: Virginia Postrel

quote: I started my career as a journalist, writing about science and technology for 'Business Week' magazine. Then I decided to make a career shift. I went to graduate school in computer science, and I began developing educational technologies - in particular, technologies to engage children in creative learning experiences.
author: Mitchel Resnick

quote: It's feasible that we'll meet other sentient life forms and conduct commerce with them. We don't now have the technology to physically travel outside our solar system for such an exchange to take place, but we are like Columbus centuries ago, learning fast how to get somewhere few think possible.
author: Dimitar Sasselov

quote: I see film as a real opportunity to examine the human condition. No matter where the technology goes in the future, the basics don't change. Storytelling is a primitive tribal function. The elders sat around the fires and told these stories as a way to pass on the 'dos' and the 'don'ts.' That will never change.
author: Michael Schultz

quote: I don't think journalism changes. It's about digging into stories and telling them well. The basic tenets of great reporting stay the same while things around it change. Technology has made reporting easier, but it has also caused job loss. Social media has increased discussion around topics, but it has its own challenges at times.
author: Soledad O'Brien

quote: Because of technology today, we expect kids to stay in touch with us too much. I think that's unnatural. We really do have to give kids their freedom and allow them to go off and become adults.
author: Andie MacDowell

quote: The most important impact of technology on communications security is that it draws better and better traffic into vulnerable channels.
author: Whitfield Diffie

quote: The bottom line is there are lots of problems that were not created by government. The biggest one is loss of middle class incomes, loss of good-paying jobs which was created by technology and globalization. Above all, when you can move a job to China or India, it reduces wages.
author: Chuck Schumer

quote: I'm guilty of being fascinated by gadgets and toys and technology, but any penny that I spend, I try to make it be a part of what I do for a living. Because then you are forwarding. You are forwarding that art, forwarding that career ahead.
author: Jeff Dunham

quote: Engineering producers who don't play and have technology as a background may be the reason why there's a lot of cold non-musical music, for lack of a better description.
author: Bill Laswell

quote: Technology continues to bring us wondrous advances in filmmaking to improve how we view movies.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: Technology will need to make many more huge leaps before one can ever view films with the level of picture and sound quality many film lovers demand without having to slide a disc into a player, especially with the technical requirements of today's 3D movies.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: 'Globalization' has become the great tag phrase, but when we talk about it, it's nearly always in terms of the global marketplace or communications technology - either data or goods that are whizzing around. We forget that people are whizzing around more and more. On them, it takes a toll.
author: Pico Iyer

quote: I've never been a great one for technology.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: Regardless of what the naysayers believe about human interaction and social media, the data show us that the abundance of technology is actually increasing the abundance of happiness all over the world.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: If I got the option of going into outer space and hanging out there for a day and then coming back home and dying the next day, or just waiting around to see if there's any opportunity for the technology to develop so that I might experience outer space sometime in the future, I would probably take the ride today and die tomorrow.
author: Ariel Pink

quote: I love technology. We can be our own DJs wherever we go.
author: Ludacris

quote: The Amish communities of Pennsylvania, despite the retro image of horse-drawn buggies and straw hats, have long been engaged in a productive debate about the consequences of technology.
author: Howard Rheingold

quote: You used to have to sing and convey emotion, and now, well, technically you can do anything with technology. It sucks for music today, but that's why that old music feels so good to me.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: As technology continues to increase our possibilities, what we're seeing is a shrinking of the lag time between what we dream about and what we create.
author: Jason Silva

quote: Success in creating AI would be the biggest event in human history. Unfortunately, it might also be the last, unless we learn how to avoid the risks.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: With any advent in technology, any technological innovation, there is the good and the bad.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: If GM had kept up with technology like the computer industry has, we would all be driving $25 cars that got 1,000 MPG.
author: Bill Gates

quote: There is a difference between what technology enables and what historical business practices enable.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Digital technology has several features that can make it much easier for teachers to pay special attention to all their students.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Software substitution, whether it's for drivers or waiters or nurses - it's progressing. Technology over time will reduce demand for jobs, particularly at the lower end of skill set.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Technology is unlocking the innate compassion we have for our fellow human beings.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Science, as opposed to technology, does violence to common sense.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I'm fascinated by the idea that genetics is digital. A gene is a long sequence of coded letters, like computer information. Modern biology is becoming very much a branch of information technology.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Science - or the products of science like technology - is just a way of achieving something real, something that happens, something that works.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I'm sorry, it's true. Having children really changes your view on these things. We're born, we live for a brief instant, and we die. It's been happening for a long time. Technology is not changing it much - if at all.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I think it's brought the world a lot closer together, and will continue to do that. There are downsides to everything; there are unintended consequences to everything. The most corrosive piece of technology that I've ever seen is called television - but then, again, television, at its best, is magnificent.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I've always wanted to own and control the primary technology in everything we do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Technology favors horrible people.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: It feels wistful to imagine a time when people didn't go about their daily routine with the assumption that at any moment another massive media technology will be dumped on us by some geek in California.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: There are really two things that have to occur in order for a new technology to be affordable to the mass market. One is you need economies of scale. The other is you need to iterate on the design. You need to go through a few versions.
author: Elon Musk

quote: If you think back to the beginning of cell phones, laptops or really any new technology, it's always expensive.
author: Elon Musk

quote: It is definitely true that the fundamental enabling technology for electric cars is lithium-ion as a cell chemistry technology. In the absence of that, I don't think it's possible to make an electric car that is competitive with a gasoline car.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Government isn't that good at rapid advancement of technology. It tends to be better at funding basic research. To have things take off, you've got to have commercial companies do it.
author: Elon Musk

quote: If you look at our current technology level, something strange has to happen to civilisations, and I mean strange in a bad way. And it could be that there are a whole lot of dead, one-planet civilisations.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Technology adds nothing to art.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: For the most part, any serious magic show is not using very much technology newer than theatrical lights.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: My body really, really wanted to reproduce when I was 15. It took a lot of civilization, socialization, willpower and some emulsion polymerization technology for me not to reproduce at 15.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: I'm very good with technology, I always have been, and with machines in general. They seem not threatening like other people find them, but a source of fun and amusement.
author: Brian Eno

quote: I'm always interested in what you can do with technology that people haven't thought of doing yet.
author: Brian Eno

quote: You can't really imagine music without technology.
author: Brian Eno

quote: I'm always interested in what you can do with technology that people haven't thought of doing yet. I think that's sort of a characteristic of the way I've worked ever since I started.
author: Brian Eno

quote: I think that technology is always invented for historical reasons, to solve a historical problem. But they very soon reveal themselves to be capable of doing things that aren't historical that nobody had ever thought of doing before.
author: Brian Eno

quote: Each of us has a vital role to play in building a world in which the government and technology serve the world's people and not the other way around.
author: Rebecca MacKinnon

quote: Can companies just claim a total lack of political responsibility in how their technology is used in all instances? It's something that companies should be thinking about when they sell their technologies around the world.
author: Rebecca MacKinnon

quote: As a filmmaker, deep blacks are essential, and in my experience, no technology captures those attributes as well as Plasma.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: The U.K. has to keep investing in new technology, skills, and infrastructure to keep pace with international competition.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: I think that people would like to, at all times, reject death and disease with technology.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: The space elevator's not just another competitive technology, promoted by people who simply like the idea of diminishing the luster of the thrusters. It would open wide the doors to space.
author: Seth Shostak

quote: It seems obvious that if a species has the brainpower for speech, along with the sort of appendages that can manipulate a pair of pliers, it will eventually blunder into science, technology, and radio.
author: Seth Shostak

quote: Audience members are only concerned about the story, the concept, the bells and whistles and the noise that a popular film starts to make even before it's popular. So audiences will not be drawn to the technology; they'll be drawn to the story. And I hope it always remains that way.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: In '83, not only was there no such thing as performance motion capture technology, there was no such thing as digital animation. This was the analog era.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Inventor: A person who makes an ingenious arrangement of wheels, levers and springs, and believes it civilization.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: I think there are going to be a bunch of tablet-like devices. It's really a different product category.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Technology is making gestures precise and brutal, and with them men.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: If it keeps up, man will atrophy all his limbs but the push-button finger.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: YouTube is akin to having my own network.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: You affect the world by what you browse.
author: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: The Web as I envisaged it, we have not seen it yet. The future is still so much bigger than the past.
author: Tim Berners-Lee
